General.Name: Dongfang Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Dongfang Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, operation, system integration, and technical servicing of energy management system solutions in China and internationally. The company offers power grid operation and maintenance services; DF8000 SCADA/ADMS/OMS, a power distribution management system; DF8000 SCADA/EMS, an intelligent transmission dispatching system; DF1800 substation automation systems to perform various functions, such as protection, monitoring, communication, control, etc.; DF1725 RTU/FRTU/BCU products used in power transmission, distribution, and power plant monitoring system; and AMI systems. It also provides consulting services, software development, project implementation, outsourcing services, and other specialized services related to IT system in electricity sector; switchgear, SVG, and power transformer; and customer care, billing, project management, plant maintenance, call center, human resource, and master data management systems, as well as mobile palm business hall. Dongfang Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Yantai, China.
